properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bino bianwa biefwe.
Bino bianwa biefwe.
Ee Baba yakanila Baba.
Ee Baba yakanila Baba.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kuno mkate kwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Ino divai yiefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Buno bulamu bwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Biosi biakhuli nawyo Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
All: Ee baba yakanila Baba.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kano kamani kefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Chino chimbande chefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Chino chinjugu chefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Bino bimelwa chefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
All: Ee baba yakanila Baba.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Buno buyinda bwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Chino chisendi chefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Buno obulala bwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Khukhurera biosi Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
All: Ee baba yakanila Baba.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Obumanani bwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Khuno khusanya khwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Obusangafu bwefwe Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
Khukhurusilia bionsi Baba,
Yakanila Baba.
All: Ee baba yakanila Baba.
